subject: Football
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: In an interview with NBC’s “Today,” Rice apologized the way he should have in May, but did not explain how he was capable of punching Janay Rice beyond having “one bad night.”
snippet: In an interview with NBC’s “Today,” Rice apologized the way he should have in May, but did not explain how he was capable of punching Janay Rice beyond having “one bad night.”
